column5: With the weekend being written off, I grabbed the dogs and the gear and headed to the pond. At least I got 3 hours in. Not the most exciting morning, but not dead either. Random samples:    Certaily beats staring at 4 walls and a puter screen. Once the rains started the bite totally shut down.

Good one Bruce...damn...wish i could find the crappie like you have so far. I also got out for 3 hours today, it was zero degrees C here with winds gusting to 45kmh....but like you say...beats sitting indoors!   Nice pics....ty for posting.
